description: Advertisement Consent to change from an internally illuminated printed display to an LCD screen at an existing bus shelter.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The maximum lux level permitted within the t</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">he proposed illuminated LCD advertisement hereby approved,&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">shall be no greater than 300cd/m2 in the hours of darkness. During the daylight hours, the luminance shall be controlled by sensors and/or timers to reflect ambient light conditions. At all times the display shall operate within that recommended by the Institution of Lighting Professional in its Professional Lighting Guide 05 (PLG 05) Brightness of Illuminated Advertisement (or its equivalent in a replacement guide).</span></p><p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To safeguard the amenity of the area and&nbsp;</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">pedestrian and highway safety in the locality.</span></p>

<p>1. No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission.</p><p>2. No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to</p><p style="margin-left: 25px;">(a)endanger persons using any highway, railway, waterway, dock, harbour or aerodrome (civil or military);<br>(b)obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air; or<br>(c)hinder the operation of any device used for the purpose of security or surveillance or for measuring the speed of any vehicle.</p><p>3. Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisements, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site.</p><p>4. Any structure or hoarding erected or used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public.</p><p>5. Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity.</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The proposed illuminated LCD advertisement hereby approved, shall display static advertisement images only and not at any time display any moving imagery.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.295;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To avoid the distraction of nearby vehicular users and safeguard pedestrian and highway safety in the locality.</span></p>
